a87be7d4fe9ab158be4f2782242284d5 (02:54): you can use the same partitioner after install to wipe that partition, and reformat it as anything you like
a87be7d4fe9ab158be4f2782242284d5 (02:55): yes, just not without destryoing the data it holds, so move the data first
